attributes.action: THE NHS SHOULD TAKE CHARGE OF HOME CARE AND SOCIAL CARE NOT AS IT IS TODAY  THAT SOCIAL SERVICES ARE IN CHARGE
attributes.additional_details:
Social Services are cutting home care  services and leaving vulnerable disabled and ill people to fend for themselves without care as I have found to my own costs my care has been slashed from live in care £46000 a year to nothing after 17 years of care despite my illnesses getting worse becasue  social services are totally in control of who gets care whom does not  in my case the hospital is at lost to understand why I get live in care for 7 years   reduced care for 18 months then  live in care again for 4 years then social services play the game by using every legal avenue and law  and policy to  ensure you get no care

SO I SAY GOVERNMENT  HAND  THE CONTROL OF HOME AND SOCIAL CARE  BACK TO THE NHS
